title: 'Very bad quality.'

title: 'Best fit!'
body: 'This top is just the best option to attend a party or a casual dinner date. The colours are beautifully blended and the V-neck redefines your neckline and change the whole appearance. It has a zipper on the side to fit better which makes it more appealing. To create a sheer look the top also has translucent sleeves. So just go for it. One of my best buys on Amazon so far!‚ù§Ô∏è'

title: 'Cute chic top'
body: 'Quality is good n the material is really comfortable.. plus it has zipper closure as the side so easily wearable.... It fits u well around the waist... Oversized sleeves with fitted around the wrists looks really stylish ... May be a bit overpriced.. But the fit is awesome... Overall a great buy... Nd my favourite from the lot And looks good as well...'
